Hello! 👋😊

Love weather & landscape photography, Fife in Scotland (home) and Iceland. þetta reddast! Logophile, ailurophile, chionophile, technophile, astrophile, nephophile, opacarophile, selenophile. EV owner. Ally 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🇺🇦🇵🇸
Immunocompromised (RA) so 😷 + 8 x 💉
No ALT, no boost. No bio, no follow.
I post a photo of ours daily. Enjoy!
